title: Wicked Forever
description: It only takes a second for everything to change.Lo and Maverick weren't expected to go the distance, yet they proved everyone wrong.But when their world is flipped upside down, and their plans for a life together hang in the balance, can they overcome all the pain, heartache, and uncertainty to get their happily-after-ever?Or will this be the one thing that love canâ€™t fix?
author: L.A. Cotton
